"Eh, why not?" Cassy said.
Jia went to the control panel. The imprisoned girl's name was Emma McDonald. She was apparently in fifth grade, had long red hair, green eyes, and her milky white skin was mottled from her head to her feet to her slim little butt in splotchy little freckles. Jia pressed the big red button and let Emma go. Just like with Hannah, the goo drained from her pod, leaving the naked girl coughing on the ground trying to catch her breath. Jia walked right over to Emma and helped the girl to her feet.
"Hi, I'm Jia! How are you?" Jia said, cheerfully.
Emma smiled.
"I'm Emma. Thanks for getting me out of there! I'd been in that darn tube all morning." She said.
"Oh, no problem." Jia said.
"Hey, they got some spare diapers in the closet over there. Think you could get me in one?" Emma said, pointing to a nearby supply clsoet.
Jia went in and found a package of large thick diapers. She and Cassy got Emma diapered up, perfectly mimicking the methods Marion, Mrs. Smith, and their mothers used on them every day. Then Emma helped get Hannah into a diaper too.
"So ,why'd you get thrown in the pods anyway?" Emma asked Hannah.
"I talked back to the teacher. You?" Hannah asked.
"I was having trouble in math and yelled out, 'Percentages are stupid!' in the middle of class." Emma said.
"Oh, that stinks." Jia said, sympathetically.
The four of them stood there a moment not sure what to do. Hannah was the one to break the silence.
"...So, should we let everyone out?" Hannah said.

What do the girls do?
124232111111.title: Release Hannah from the pod

124232111112.content:
"Yeah, we don't have much time anyway. Besides, if we didn't want to get in trouble wouldn't we have to put her back in the pod when we're done? What stupid idea!" Jia said.
Cassy sighed.
"Yeah. Well, at least we got to see her for a little bit. Maybe Mrs. Smith will let her out by lunch time, right?" Cassy said.
Cassy and Jia made their way back to their classroom, keeping as quiet as they could. To their relief, Mrs. Smith was still on coffee break and Marion was still tending to the other little girls taking potty breaks. Jia sat down at her table, while Cassy picked up her school supplies and went to the empty seat next Jia where Hannah had once been.
"So, you see any good TV shows yesterday? I missed that lest episode of 'Diapered Princess'." Cassy said.
Diapered Princess was a TV show about a girl who was the heiress to a modern kingdom, who still needed diapers. It was quite popular in Diaper Elementary for obvious reasons.
Jia was about to answer when Marion came up behind her.
"Hey, where were you two? I looked up from cleaning the other kids up a few minutes ago and I couldn't see you anywhere?" Marion said.
Jia shuddered but hid it well. This could mean she was in trouble.
"No, we were here the whole time!" Cassy said, awkwardly.
It was Cassy's first instinct to lie. She was obviously nervous, and wasn't very good at lying, but Marion seemed to buy it.

What does Jia do?
124232111112.title: Go back to class before Mrs. Smith gets back

choices: Give Hannah a ball to make her feel better
Let Hannah get over it on her own and go to the swing set
1242321111121.content:
"Yeah, we were here the whole time." Jia said, playing it cool.
Marion totally bought the lie.
"Okay, I guess." She said, shrugging her shoulders.

Mrs. Smith came back a short time later and lessons resumed. Things went smoothly until the bell rang for lunch. All the kids went down to the cafeteria to have some food, but a lucky few with good grades and behavior got to go to a special room where they'd be fed warm, sweet nutritious breast milk and get to snuggle with one of the teachers. Jia and Cassy had not earned that privilege today, so they just sat down together at a table to eat regular food. A short time after they'd chosen their spot, Hannah came down to join them.

Hannah was wearing nothing but a light green diaper. Light green diapers were given to girls who had been in detention as a symbol of shame. Hannah was looking rather down. She frowned, couldn't look people in the face, and slumped her shoulders. It was clear she felt very bad about her behavior and felt very bad to be wearing a green diaper of shame. She looked rather tired as well. Unbirthing pods tended to drain out a kid's energy.
"Hey, Hannah. You okay?" Cassy asked.
"...I don't know." Hannah murmured.
Jia put her hand on Hannah's shoulder as the brown-haired girl sat next to her.
"It's okay, Hannah. Everybody gets in trouble every once in a while." Jia said.
Hannah sighed, although she did feel better being around her friends. The three little girls ate quietly until it was time for recess.

What does Jia do now that recess has started?
1242321111121.title: Back Cassy up and lie

choices: Marion tells her and Jia gets a treat
Marion forgets and Jia gets nothing
124232112.content:
Jia stood up in the middle of Marion's lecture. She quickly and quietly made her way to the back of the room where the potty chair was.
"Oh, do you need some help?" Marion said.
The blonde-haired assistant turned to the class.
"Take a break for a few minutes. I'm going to help Jia." Marion said.
Marion went to the back and helped Jia remove her diaper. She also took off Jia's pink unicorn shirt, leaving the little girl totally naked. Jia sat down on the potty chair to poop. In a flash, Jia had pooped in the potty chair. Marion smiled.
"Great job, Jia! You went in the potty!" Marion said.
Jia was pretty happy about this. She didn't go in the potty very often (none of the kids could do it regularly) so this was an accomplishment. Marion stood little Jia up and wiped her butt with some wet wipes She then laid Jia down on the changing mat and powdered her up before putting her in a fresh diaper. Marion checked the legs to make sure they were secure and helped Jia back to her feet.

"Do I get a treat?" Jia asked.
Marion laughed.
"Maybe. I'll talk it over with Mrs. Smith when she gets back. If you want, I can give you a sticker, though." Marion said.
Marion took a gold star sticker and put it on Jia's diaper, right on her butt. Jia excitedly did a little happy dance. Marion laughed again.
"Okay, okay. Calm down. Let's get you back in your seat so we can resume the lesson." Marion said.

Marion didn't give Jia her shirt back, deciding to keep her in just her diaper for a while. This wasn't unusual or uncommon. Lots of times students went around wearing nothing more than their diapers,often for convenience since it made it easier to change them. No one really cared anyway, it wasn't seen as a big deal. Marion had scarcely resumed her lecture when Mrs. Smith got back.
124232112.title: Make it to the potty chair

choices: Mrs. Smith lets them out after an hour
Mrs. Smith lets them out at lunch time
1242322.content:
Jia couldn't resist.
"What is it?" She said.
"I really liked the part where..." Hannah was cut off.
"Didn't I just tell you two to be quiet?" Mrs. Smith sternly said.
"Aw, man. I was only whispering!" Hannah defiantly said.
Mrs. Smith didn't want to deal with this. she just wanted to teach the material.
"I think you two need to calm down. How about an hour or two in the unbirthing pods?" She said.
"Oh no..." Jia said.
Mrs. Smith grabbed the two girls by the wrist and sent them to the hallway. She took them to a room in the basement where the unbirthing pods were kept. These were womb-like pods where misbehaving students were sent to calm down. It wasn't painful or unpleasant, in fact it was very relaxing... but it was also humiliating to be sent there.
"This is all your fault." Jia said to Hannah.
Hannah only grumbled.

"Come on you two. Off with your clothes and get in the pod." Mrs. Smith said.
She opened up a pod, intending to make the tow girls share it.

Jia took off her shirt, and Hannah removed her small dress. They stood there wearing nothing but their diapers.
"Diapers too. Come on." Mrs. Smith said.
Jia quickly removed her diaper and stepped into the unbirthing pod. Hannah reluctantly removed hers. She had apparently wet herself at some point. Mrs. Smith moved the naked Hannah into the pod with Jia and closed the door. A special bio-mechanical umbilical cord rose up and attached itself to Jia and Hannah's bellybuttons. It would provide them with air and other essentials while they were in there. The unbirthing pod filled with water and the two naked girls floated together, tethered to the wall by the umbilicus.

Jia closed her eyes and relaxed. Instantly, she calmed down. Hannah curled up in a little ball and she relaxed too, to the point that she nearly felt her body go numb.
1242322.title: Keep talking in class

12423221.content:
Some time later, Jia awoke to the sound of draining water. The unbirthing pod was draining and her umbilicus had just detached from her bellybutton. The door to the pod soon opened. Naked little Jia and Hannah soon tumbled out of the pod onto the soft, damp floor below. Both of them spat up pod fluid and Jia even peed a little.
"You two ready to go back to class?" Mrs. Smith said.
Hannah nodded. Jia only groaned.
"All right. Let's go." Mrs. Smith said.
She quickly got out some diapers, but not normal white ones like before. No, you and Hannah would have to wear humiliating green diapers. When kids were bad the teachers made them wear green diapers, which meant the other kids would know they were in trouble. Mrs. Smith quickly dried all the unbirthing fluid off of Hannah's body, powdered her, and got her into a fresh green diaper. Hannah hung her head in shame, knowing she was a bad kid today. Worse still, Mrs. Smith did not let her have her dress back, making the brown-haired little girl go around in only her diaper. This wasn't unusual for her, though. Plenty of kids at Diaper elementary went around like that to make quick diaper changes and checks easier.

Mrs. Smith moved on to Jia, still laying on the ground, feeling very weak and tired out. The unbirthing pods tended to take a lot of energy out of her.
12423221.title: Mrs. Smith lets them out after an hour

choices: Mrs. Smith makes Jia stand in front of class to answer a question
Mrs. Smith takes a coffee break so the kids get a few minutes to talk
124232212.content:
Jia looked up at Mrs. Smith, expecting to get put straight into a diaper like her friend Hannah.
"Nuh-uh-uh, kiddo. Bio-scans from the pod indicate you've got a lot of extra waste in your body that needs to come out." Mrs. Smith said.
Jia let out a groan. She knew this would be uncomfortable and humiliating, just like anything else that happened to her when she was bad.

Mrs. Smith took a towel and dried the unbirthing fluid from Jia's naked body. She lifted up the little girl and placed her on a table near some strange devices.
"Now, try not to move around too much, okay?" Mrs. Smith said.
She took a two-pronged tube, and moved it toward Jia's diaper area. The larger prong was brown, and would go in Jia's butt. The smaller prong was yellow, and would drain her bladder. Mrs. Smith gently inserted the device into Jia's anus and pee-hole. Jia squirmed a little, but did her best to restrain herself. It was very uncomfortable. Mrs Smith turned on a machine, and it began draining Jia's poop and pee straight from her body. Jia closed her eyes and grimaced, visibly unpleasant. She would sometimes let out a soft, weak grunt or a light moan. Hannah looked on sympathetically. She'd had this done to her before too, and she didn't like it either. No one did.

Soon the machine stopped, sensing that there was no waste left to remove form Jia's body.
"Is it done yet?" The little Asian girl said.
Mrs. Smith nodded.
"Sure is, kiddo. Let's get you diapered up." She said.
Mrs. Smith removed the tubes from Jia and set them aside to clean later. She got out a thick green diaper, the kind kids who were bad had to wear, and put it under Jia's butt. She then powdered Jia up, and taped her into her fresh diaper. She even checked around Jia's legs to make sure it fit snugly and wouldn't leak.

Mrs. Smith tried to help Jia to her feet, but the little girl's knees buckled the moment she tried to stand. Jia fell down on her diapered butt.
"Oh, are you okay?" Mrs. Smith asked.
"Uh-huh..." Jia said, rubbing her padded bottom.
"Maybe I should carry you back to class." Mrs. Smith said.
She lifted Jia up and carried her like a baby all the way back to the classroom, with Hannah following closely behind. Both little girls felt an intense sense of shame walking down the hallways in green diapers, the ones reserved for bad kids. The other students stared at them, and some even went, "Oooooooh..." as if Jia and Hannah had just done something bad right then and there.

Mrs. Smith took Jia to her seat and set her down while Hannah quickly went to her own desk next to Jia and their other friend, Cassy. Mrs. Smith resumed her lesson and got back to her lecture. Jia had a hard time concentrating, though. Little Jia was overcome with shame at having to wear a green diaper. She didn't say anything about it, but she could tell the other girls and even her blonde-headed friend Cassy were giving her looks. Normally Jia was a great student and a very well-behaved kid. It wasn't normal for a girl like her to be put in a green diaper. Jia slumped in her seat, trying not to be noticed. Hannah saw how distressed her little friend was, and patted her bare shoulder.
"It's okay. I'm right here too." Hannah whispered.
Jia felt a little better, but not by much.
124232212.title: Drain her waste first

choices: Jia is allowed to go to recess
1242322122.content:
Mrs. Smith wrapped up a portion of her lecture and set her papers down.
"Well, how about we take a break? I'm going to get something to drink." The teacher said.
She turned to Marion, the teacher's assistant (and also Cassy's older teenage sister)
"Marion, why don't you do some diaper checks and see if anyone needs a change." Mrs. Smith said.
"Can do!" Marion said.
Marion went around the room slipping a finger down little girls' diapers to see if they were wet or not. A couple had wet themselves and some had even messed. Jia, Hannah, and Cassy were all dry and clean, though. Mario took the kids needing diaper changes to the back to get cleaned up while Mrs. Smith went out to get some coffee.

Cassy went between Jia and Hannah's desks and looked in disbelief at their green punishment diapers.
"Wow, the green diapers? I thought all you did was talk back to the teacher." Cassy said.
Jia slumped in her seat. Hannah patted her Asian friend's shoulder.
"That is all we did. Sometimes that's all it takes." Hannah said.
"Yeah, but still, it's crazy to see. I mean, you, Hannah, I can see you getting the green diapers, but Jia? Wow, I never thought I'd see it." Cassy said, amazed.
Jia closed her eyes.
"Yeah, yeah, I know. Could we try not to talk so much about it..." Jia said, still overcome with shame.
Hannah stood next to Jia and gave he a light hug to try and make her feel better.
"All right, I'll cut it out... but still... wow..." Cassy said.
Jia softly nuzzled her head against her friend Hannah's chest and held her hand. Cassy could tell the two of them were having a bad time and held their hands too.
"It's okay, I'm sure things'll be better later, right?" Cassy said.
Jia tried to smile. She thought about it an became hopeful and a little more optimistic.

Soon Mrs. Smith came back with her coffee and resumed the lesson.
"Now class, onwards to..." She went on.

Things went smoothly until it was time for lunch. Good kids got to eat first. Really good kids earned the privilege to drink breast milk for lunch. Bad kids, like Jia and Hannah were today, had to eat at the "Bad Kids Table", a table in the back of the cafeteria. Jia ate her lunch quickly, it didn't really taste good anyway.
1242322122.title: A little down time

choices: Jia starts acting up and being bad again
12423221222.content:
Instead of going out to recess to paly with the other kids, bad kids had to go into a windowless room in the basement and do a writing assignment.

"All right, girls, lunch I over, let's go." Ms. Loris, one of the assistant principals said.
The bad kids, all of them cute little girls dressed in nothing more than the shameful green diapers of punishment, were all led by Ms. Loris down the hall to a classroom in the basement. Ms. Loris handed all of them a pencil and a paper. She turned on a projector so they all could see the paragraph they had to write. Jia sat down at a desk and glanced up at the wall. The thing she had to write said,

"I am here because I misbehaved and had to be punished. If I had behaved well today, I would be outside or in the gym playing and having fun with my friends, but instead, I am inside writing this paragraph. I need to improve my behavior or I may have to write this again. I will write this paragraph in full, on the piece of paper given to me, and turn it in the disciplinary instructor when I am finished. Then I will put my head down on the desk and remain quiet for the remainder of what would have been my recess period. Signed, (your name here)"

Jia felt absolutely miserable reading it, and even worse knowing she had to copy it word for word. Slowly, and full of shame, Jia copied the paragraph onto her paper. She often had to stop and re-read what she was writing when she got to a hard word, like "behavior" or "disciplinary". The longer she wrote it, the worse it got. Jia felt like she had failed herself and her school in being a bad kid. By the end of the writing assignment, she was on the verge of tears. The sad little Asian girl was the last one to complete the assignment. Then, Jia stood up, and slowly walked over to Ms. Loris to turn it in. Ms. Loris didn't seem to be on the same page as Jia, she was happily humming a nameless tune in the back of the classroom near the door, daydreaming about her favorite TV shows. She was in charge of taking bad kids to detention almost every day, so this was just an ordinary part of the job for her.
"Here, Ms. Loris." Jia said, handing the paper over.
"Thank you, Jia. You may put your head down." Ms. Loris said, patting Jia's head.
Jia went back to her seat and buried her face in her arms. She just wanted this awful day to end.
12423221222.title: Jia is kept inside

choices: Jia goes and plays with Cassy
12423222.content:
Jia floated naked in the pod for a very long time. Even though it was crowded sharing it with Hannah, in a way it was nice. Unbirthing pods could get lonely after a while and sharing it with another girl helped ease the loneliness. Eventually, little Jia started to get hungry. She knew that nutrients could be pumped into her through the umbilicus attached to her bellybutton, but it just wasn't as satisfying as actual eating. Just as she hoped, the water in the unbirthing pod began to drain shortly after she became hungry.

Mrs. Smith and her assistant Marion opened up the pod. Jia gasped for air and Hannah coughed some of the water out of her body. The cool air hit Jia like a brick. She immediately began shivering. So did Hannah. The two umbilicuses disconnected from the girls' bellybuttons and fell to the side. Mrs. Smith held out a large towel. Jia and Hannah both got wrapped the towel around themselves and huddled together for warmth.
"Calmed down?" Mrs. Smith said.
Jia and Hannah nodded.
"Are you two going to behave?" She asked.
"Yes Mrs. Smith." The cold naked girls chorused.
"Good. Let's get you two dressed. It's time for lunch.

Mrs. Smith got to diapering Hannah, while Marion took Jia. Jia was set down, dried off a bit more, and put in a diaper. Marion also gave Jia back her unicorn T-shirt.
"All done. Come on, let's get you something to eat. You must be starving." Marion said.
Unbirthing pods did tend to leave anyone left in them tired and hungry for some reason.

Jia and Hannah went to the lunchroom to pick up some food. They both decided to have sandwiches and sat down at their table with Cassy. Their hair was still damp from the unbirthing pod.
"Man, you guys were gone for a long time." Cassy said.
"Tell me about it. I was bored out of my skull." Hannah said.
Jia sighed and took a bite of her sandwich.
"We didn't miss anything too important, did we?" Jia asked.
"Not really. Just read the science book, all the photosynthesis stuff we learned is in there." Cassy said.

The girls soon finished eating. It was just about time for recess. Cassy stood up to leave, but Hannah stayed behind.
"You staying back?" Cassy asked.
"Yeah... I'm still a bit tired out from being in that stupid pod." Hannah said.
Cassy turned to Jia.
"What about you, Jia? If we go quick we might get a place on one of the swing sets." Cassy said.
12423222.title: Mrs. Smith lets them out at lunch time

choices: Diaper, a skirt and a shirt
Extra-thick diaper, too thick to wear anything over it, and a shirt
1243.content:
It was the start of a brand new day getting ready for school! Hannah walked out of the shower where her mom was waiting for her with a towel. Hannah quickly started drying herself off. Mom took Hannah back to the little girl's bedroom.
"What od you want to wear today, sweety?" Mom asked.
1243.title: Hannah

12433.content:
Hannah felt like putting on the extra-thick diaper today.
"I want the thick one!" She cheerfully said.
Mom laughed.
"All right, sweetie. Let's get you dressed."
Mom laid Hannah down on the changing station in the little girl's room. She unfolded a diaper under Hannah's butt and began rubbing baby oil on Hannah's diaper area. Mom then added some powder before quickly taping her daughter's diaper right up.
"There you go!" Mom said, patting the front of Hannah's extra-thick diaper.
Hannah loved the thick diapers. They were so soft and cozy and made her feel good. The only thing she didn't like was that they were so thick she had to waddle sometimes. This wasn't really a big deal to Hannah, but it was sometimes a nuisance.

Hannah slipped on a short purple shirt, only barely long enough to cover her little belly. Her diaper was totally visible. Mom then got Hannah in the car with her book bag and got the little girl to class. They got there relatively early, so there were still plenty of open seats. Hannah sat down next to her best friends, a short haired blonde girl named Cassy whose older sister was the teacher's assistant, and Jia, a short little Asian girl.
"Hi Jia! Hi Cassy!" Hannah said.
"Hey, Hannah. How's it going?" Cassy asked.
"I'm doing great!" Hannah said.
"Did yo ucatch yesterday's episode of Diapered Princess?" Jia asked.
Diapered Princess was a show the girls watched on TV. It was a kid's comedy about modern princess in a small kingdom that still needed to wear diapers.
"Yeah! Did see the part where..." Hannah was cut off when their teacher, Mrs. Smith came in.
"Good morning, class! Pass your homework forward to the front of the room so I can collect it." Mrs. Smith said.
Hannah dug through her book bag to find her homework.
12433.title: Extra-thick diaper

125.content:
3 girls to choose from. All three of them are friends and they're in the same class.

1. Elise. Black hair, blue eyes. One of the cool popular girls with lots of friends.

2. Christy. Very long light hair, almost silver colored. It goes down to her waist. Has a good sense of humor and can be a bit of a troublemaker. Likes funny pranks, but is never mean-spirited about it.

3. Alexa. Sometimes they call her Lexi. Short girl but with long blonde hair, everybody thinks she's really cute. A very girly-girl, she's into pink stuff. Sometimes she wears a little tiara and pretends she's a princess.
125.title: 5th- Age 11

1253.content:
Alexa hopped out of her mom's car to start a new day of school. The little girl was wearing a cute pink dress with her favorite plastic tiara... and a diaper underneath it all.
"Have fun at school, Lexi!" Mom called out.
"I will, Mom!" Alexa replied.
She excitedly ran to her first class of the day, which was...
1253.title: Alexa

info.brief_description: You are at a new grade school, and kids of all grades are in diapers. Have fun.
info.description:
So, you are at a school that has all children wearing diapers. You can choose which grade you are in between kindergarten and 6th grade. Unbirth and Breastfeeding are allowed and even encouraged in the story. Oh, and all teachers will be female.


Things that are not allowed in the story:
1. Vore (This does not include unbirth.)
2. Age regression.
3. Child Abuse or any other kind of abuse.
4. Killing or Death of any characters.
5. Hurting of any characters.
6. Bullying. (It can be mentioned as something that happened to the characters in the past, but there will be no chapters where it focus's on anyone being bullied, past or present.)
7. Blood and Gore.
8. Gender Swap (This includes if the character is unbirthed.)
9. Extreme scenes of diaper usage. (Diaper usage can be mentioned, but keep in mild toned.)

If what was listed above is not followed or you try to find loopholes around them, your chapters will be deleted. These rules are subject to change. If you have any questions or suggestions that you would like to give, email me onsite. Have fun and try to help me get at least 40 chapters up.
